means: （尤指天主教对异教徒的）审判者

sentence.Network_en: He was the tormentor, he was the protector , he was the inquisitor , he was the friend.
sentence.Network_cn: 他既是拷打者,又是保护者;既是审问者, 又是朋友.

sentence.Network_en: The Inquisitor could not be more just to you if you were his own daughter.
sentence.Network_cn: 宗教法官大人对你公正无私,就象你是他的亲生女儿一样.

sentence.Network_en: What is the pope's most feared inquisitor doing in Venice, Bishop Pucci?
sentence.Network_cn: 教皇最敬畏的检察官来威尼斯干什么普西主教大人?

PerfectNetExp.abs: 审判者（Inquisitor）: 审判者是攻击型牧师中的一种，他们有能力让目标遭受极大的痛苦。这都归功于其神圣之力，这些魔法通常能大 …

英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译(I) ... inquisitively 好问地 inquisitor 询问者 inquisitorial 询问人的.

list.abs: 沪江词库精选Rhagium inquisitor是什么意思、英语短语。Rhagium inquisitor的意思是: 松皮天牛相关短语: Rhagium inquisitor 松皮天牛.
Kathleen announced American confederative inquisitor this reconciles agreement ., 美国联邦检察官凯瑟琳公布了这一和解协议.
before this , inquisitor asks to sentence Li Jianxi set term of imprisonment 7 years , be in with 350 billion Han yuan ( about 350 million dollar ) amerce .此前，检察官要求判处李健熙有期徒刑7年，并处以3500亿韩元(约3.5亿美元)的罚款。
marked by inquisitive interest ; especially suggestive of an ecclesiastical inquisitor .以询问的兴趣为特点；特别是让人想起宗教法官。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from French inquisiteur, from Latin inquisitor, from the verb inquirere (see enquire)

entry.tran: 审讯人;调查人;严厉的提问者
entry.def: An inquisitor is someone who is asking someone else a series of questions, especially in a rather hostile way or as part of an inquisition.

means.word_mean: 1. a questioner who is excessively harsh
